flawed_nl_solution:
The total rain was 2 inches + 1 inches = <<2+1=8>>8 inches on Monday.
The total rain was 2 * 8 inches = <<2*8=16>>16 inches on Tuesday.
The total rain was 0 inches + 1 inch = <<0+1=1>>1 inch across Wednesday and Thursday.
The total rain was 8 inches + 16 inches + 1 inch = <<8+16+1=25>>25 inches on Friday.
There were 8 inches + 16 inches + 1 inch + 25 inches = <<8+16+1+25=50>>50 inches total last week.
50 inches/5 days = <<50/5=10>>10 inches average daily rain.
